column4: What are the possible reasons that I wouldn't be able to get any ping response from my wireless router when I received the dhcp response FROM the server, and I have the proper ip and everything?
this router IS responding to ping requests...
I'm reading some stuff now... any things I could try before I do a bunch of research?
I didn't do anything weird that would have caused this except maybe upgrade some packages within my breezy
interesting.... what does one do about it?
this all worked fine for the last few months, mind you
this is an all of a sudden thing
it was a good thought. got any others? =p
if I run iwconfig as root, it shows me my encryption key
